actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the eligibility of a citizen to hold the Office of President.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Permits an otherwise eligible citizen of the United States to hold the office of President even if such individual is not a natural born citizen.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the eligibility of a citizen to hold the Office of President.
